item.title: Explorers and Exploiters: Mapping Search Strategies of Folktale Collectors
item.description: Exploration versus Exploitation In our research, we’re looking into two predominant biases among folktales collectors: exploration bias and exploitation bias. These biases manifest in two key dimensions: geographical coverage and story content. Or at least, that’s what we’re focussing on today. Let’s start with the geographical dimension. Exploration bias here refers to a collector’s inclination to cover a larger area, constantly moving to new locations without fully documenting the areas already visited.
